allow: Bash(for file in bookNow.html dublin.html hilliard.html upper-arlington.html worthington.html powell.html plain-city.html index.html)
Bash(for file in dublin.html hilliard.html upper-arlington.html worthington.html powell.html plain-city.html index.html)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Remove no-cors mode to properly send booking data to Google Apps Script

Fixed the issue where Google Apps Script was receiving undefined postData
by removing the no-cors mode and using proper fetch configuration.

Changes (js/bookNow.js):
- Removed mode: ''no-cors'' which was preventing body data from being sent
- Changed Content-Type to ''text/plain;charset=utf-8'' for GAS compatibility
- Added redirect: ''follow'' to handle GAS redirects properly
- Added proper response parsing with error handling
- Added detailed console logging to debug submissions
- Can now read actual response from Google Apps Script

Why this fixes the issue:
- no-cors mode strips the request body, causing e.postData to be undefined
- Google Apps Script needs the body data to process bookings
- Now the full JSON payload will be sent and accessible via e.postData
- The script can now read success/error responses from GAS

Version Updates:
- Updated bookNow.js?v=gas-cors-fix across all pages

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(for file in dublin.html hilliard.html upper-arlington.html worthington.html powell.html plain-city.html)
Bash(for file in bookNow.html dublin.html hilliard.html index.html plain-city.html powell.html upper-arlington.html worthington.html)
